Redis.OM.Identity
-----------------

###

.NET Identity for Redis Provider based on Redis OM


![](data:image/png;base64,)

###

### What is Redis OM

###

Redis OM provides high-level abstractions for using Redis in .NET, making it easy to model and query your Redis domain objects.  
  
This preview release contains the following features:  
  
Declarative object mapping for Redis objects  
Declarative secondary-index generation  
Fluent APIs for querying Redis  
Fluent APIs for performing Redis aggregations

###

### Whats Redis.OM.Identity

###

For .NET users, this package provides you with the identity framework for the Redis database, it is built based on Redis OM, and it gives you new stores for identity managers.  
  
The identity entities indexed as Redis collections and ready to use.

###

### Setup

    dotnet add package Redis.OM.Identity

###

    services.AddIdentity<IdentityUser, IdentityRole>()
                    .AddRedisOMStores(options =>
                    {
                        options.EndPoints.Add("localhost:6379");
                    });
###

Add the indexes creator:

        await _provider.Connection.CreateIndexAsync(typeof(IdentityRole));
        await _provider.Connection.CreateIndexAsync(typeof(IdentityRoleClaim));
        await _provider.Connection.CreateIndexAsync(typeof(IdentityUser));
        await _provider.Connection.CreateIndexAsync(typeof(IdentityUserClaim));
        await _provider.Connection.CreateIndexAsync(typeof(IdentityUserLogin));
        await _provider.Connection.CreateIndexAsync(typeof(IdentityUserRole));
        await _provider.Connection.CreateIndexAsync(typeof(IdentityUserToken));
